ModMetaData.name: RimTales
ModMetaData.author: TheCosmicSlug - https://github.com/thecosmicslug/RimTales
ModMetaData.description: RimTales - A Story Exporter for Rimworld. Heavily based on 'Tale Log [Retold]' by Nandonalt, Spuddy. After fixing it for v1.3 I decided to carry on tweaking the code. Many thanks to the original authors, The Source will be uploaded on Github soon.
